gui.inputHandlers

Interface Clickable

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    CanvasContent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Container, Form, FormWrapper

    public interface Clickable
    Interface with methods to provide support for handling clicks.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onClick(SingleClick click)
      Implement to choose which behavior is expected on a single click.
      void onDoubleClick(DoubleClick click)
      Implement to choose the behavior that is expected on a double click.
      void onDragEnd(Drag drag)
      Implement to choose the expected behavior when a mouse drag ends.
      void onDragUpdate(Drag drag)
      Implement to choose the expected behavior when a the mouse is being dragged.

    • Method Detail

      • onClick

        void onClick(SingleClick click)
        Implement to choose which behavior is expected on a single click.
        Parameters:
        click - SingleClick containing information about the position of the click

      • onDoubleClick

        void onDoubleClick(DoubleClick click)
        Implement to choose the behavior that is expected on a double click.
        Parameters:
        click - DoubleClick containing information about the position of the click

      • onDragEnd

        void onDragEnd(Drag drag)
        Implement to choose the expected behavior when a mouse drag ends.
        Parameters:
        drag - Drag containing information about the positions of the drag

      • onDragUpdate

        void onDragUpdate(Drag drag)
        Implement to choose the expected behavior when a the mouse is being dragged.
        Parameters:
        drag - Drag containing information about the positions of the drag
